nodes.text: "Anakin's Betrayal" is a piece written by John Williams for the Revenge of the Sith soundtrack. It represents the tragic turn of Anakin Skywalker to the dark side of the Force. It was performed by the London Symphony Orchestra and the London Voices. The piece won Williams a Grammy nomination for Best Film Score. A motif from Attack of the Clones forms the central structure of the piece.

In the The Rise of Skywalker soundtrack for the 2019 film Star Wars: Episode IX The Rise of Skywalker, "Anakin's Betrayal" appears in the track "The Force Is with You," where it morphes into "Rey's Theme," which in turn transitions to "The Emperor's Theme."
